text:
Hello @Everyone
Is there any option in HubSpot Webpage setting that I can change Multi Language Slug *en-gb to uk or en-us to us.?*
I want to create URL Like <https://www.domain.com/uk/about> but don't want to add in Content Slug

Please advise
Thanks

Hello! I was wondering if someone can help me out with this? I want to create a language switcher module with the function to be able to toggle between English, German and Chinese. I went through the proper steps listed in the documentation where I create multi-language pages. I have my web pages in all 3 languages, just need to create the proper button switcher for it.
My language switcher already senses what language the web page it is so... I want to create a for loop of the list of languages, urls attached to them, and image of country flag.
I could hard code this myself and create buttons containing the link to the proper web page but I feel like I wouldn't be utilizing HubSpot's Language Switcher efficiently this way.

I don't know how to create a proper for-loop and adding in URLs the Hubl way.
I feel like I'm VERY close lol. Or if anyone has any other suggestions, I am open to that. :slightly_smiling_face: Thank you!
